explains: v. 重建，重新组装；使复原，使恢复（rebuild 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The old south grandstand must be rebuilt.
sentences.cn: 破旧的南看台一定要重建。

sentences.en: It was rebuilt on the site of the old building.
sentences.cn: 它是在原来建筑物的旧址上重新建造的。

sentences.en: The president has promised the patriarch that the cathedral will be rebuilt: walls, dome and all.
sentences.cn: 总统承诺主教将要重建这座大教堂：墙壁、穹顶及所有其他的东西。
